*[[Underground]] *[[Berry Master]] *[[Dungeons]] |value = 100 {{Gem|Grass}} }} ==Description== The '''Meadow Plate''' is a type of [[Underground|Underground Item]]. ==Details== The Meadow Plate has a value of 100 [[Gems|Grass Gems]] {{Gem|Grass}} when sold. It can also be traded in Daily Deals. ==Acquisition== Meadow Plates can be found in the [[Underground]], traded for with the [[Berry Master|Hoenn Berry Master]], and as Loot in [[Dungeons]]. ===Dungeons=== {{Loot/headâ€Ž|Underground Items}} {{LootItem|Sprout Tower|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Petalburg Woods|Epic}} {{LootItem|Eterna Forest|Epic}} {{LootItem|Hall of Origin|Epic}} {{LootItem|Flower Paradise|Epic}} {{LootItem|Pinwheel Forest|Epic}} {{LootItem|Frost Cavern|Epic}} {{LootItem|Verdant Cavern|Epic}} {{LootItem|Melemele Meadow|Epic}} {{LootItem|Lush Jungle|Epic}} {{LootItem|Exeggutor Island Hill|Epic}} {{LootItem|Dyna Tree Hill|Epic}} |} |} {{Underground Items}} [[Category:Items]] [[Category:Gems]]
